item.source: Need to add a shop! How tho?

item.title: Need to add a shop! How tho?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

If you have an existing one go to shop.cfg, then look at the following piece of code

shop = 1	Food And Supplies.		1	1	391	20	397	20

Shop = 1 is the number of the shop, it can be anything as long as it isn’t used already.

Food and supplies is what will show up for the title of that shop

1 1 means something about if its general or not Just keep it at 1 1 for now

391 is the item id 20 is how much that store has
397 is another item id and the 20 is how much it has

You just repeat what you want so its just

ItemId Price

-tyrael-

Read full topic
